offer.Description: Indicates how much was offered to the player out of $20

proposer_ID.LongName: Type of the proposer for this trial
proposer_ID.Description: Indicates whether the offer was human-generated or computer-generated

Levels.computer: offer is randomly generated by the computer
Levels.PRP1: offer is proposed previously by another person (first proposer)
Levels.PRP2: offer is proposed previously by another person (second proposer)
Levels.PRP3: offer is proposed previously by another person (third proposer)
Levels.PRP4: offer is proposed previously by anotherperson (fourth proposer)
Levels.PRP5: offer is proposed previously by anotherperson (fifth proposer)
Levels.PRP6: offer is proposed previously by anotherperson (sixth proposer)

anger.Description: Indicates if participant felt anger toward the proposed offer
